text: Answer (b) Sotution We have to sort 108 numbers calculating time required by system A:- Number of instructions = 10n2 = 10+(106)2 A executes 1019 instruction /sec So, time require= 242" — 1000 seconds — (1) Calculating time required by system Bi- Number of instructions = 100 n log n = 100+1054I0g(108) instructions B executes 108 instructions/ sec. So, time required = 2219809 50 seconds -—-(2) By comparing (1) and (2), we find that B is 50 times faster than A. Answer: B
